MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the ML12 postcode area of Biggar. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:23pm. Our emergency response team are on site carrying out line patrols and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:00pm on Monday, 26 October 2020
